data.eml:eml: Water mites of the genus Lebertia Neuman, 1880 (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Lebertiidae) from Turkey, with the description of one new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guelle, Pinar, Boyaci, Yunus Oemer (2012): Water mites of the genus Lebertia Neuman, 1880 (Acari, Hydrachnidia, Lebertiidae) from Turkey, with the description of one new species. ZooKeys 238: 23-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3861, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.238.3861
